**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _zombie staff_ is etched with the rotting visage of an undead humanoid grimacing in terror and dismay carved atop it. The staff's [_animate dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=666) spells can be used only to animate [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) that have flesh and an Intelligence modifier of –4 or lower. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Zombie Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 1.1 **Price** 330 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** _protect companion_
  • **1st** _animate dead_, [_necromancer's generosity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=955)
  • **2nd** _animate dead_, [_final sacrifice_](/Spells.aspx?ID=689)
Zombie Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 1.1 **Price** 1,200 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** _animate dead_, [_bind undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=22), _necromancer's generosity_
  • **4th** _animate dead_, [_enervation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=687), _final sacrifice_
Zombie Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 1.1 **Price** 5,600 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** _animate dead_, _necromancer's generosity_
  • **6th** _animate dead_, _final sacrifice_, [_necrotize_](/Spells.aspx?ID=956)
name: Zombie Staff (Greater)
